issue.title: Warning messages during installation
issue.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Depending on the PHP security level, some warning messages are displayed when installing the CORE (ADMIN) component.
Even if there is also successful messages at the end of the procedure, it would be better to fix this problem for the end-user convenience.


**Fixed versions :** 4.0.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

is this problem stil existing ?

I think it was corrected.

**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Installation procedure should be tested completely to retreive exactly in which PHP security levels warning are returned.
Not sure that we can change something as it concerns simplexml php class file which is a utility package inside Joomla.

**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

What about this with new EasySDI V4 ?

Is there any test done before packaging it ?

**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

easySDI V4 has been fully tested with strict PHP level; so no more notice or warning messages during installation process or when working on easySDI.
